```{r}
pums_2019_1yr <- getCensus(
  name = "acs/acs1/pums",
  vintage = 2019,
  region = "public use microdata area:*", 
  regionin = "state:06",
  vars = c(
    "SERIALNO",
    "SPORDER",
    "PWGTP",
    "WGTP",
    "NP",
    "HHL",
    "HINCP",
    "TEN",
    "R60",
    "ACCESS",
    "R65",
    "OCCP"
  )
)
```

```{r}
ca_pumas <-
  pumas("CA", cb = T, progress_bar = F)

bay_county_names <-
  c(
    "Alameda",
    "Contra Costa",
    "Marin",
    "Napa",
    "San Francisco",
    "San Mateo",
    "Santa Clara",
    "Solano",
    "Sonoma"
  )

bay_counties <-
  counties("CA", cb = T, progress_bar = F) %>%
  filter(NAME %in% bay_county_names)

```

```{r}
bay_pumas <-
  ca_pumas %>% 
  st_centroid() %>% 
  .[bay_counties, ] %>% 
  st_drop_geometry() %>% 
  left_join(ca_pumas %>% select(GEOID10)) %>% 
  st_as_sf()
```

```{r}
bay_pums <-
  pums_2019_1yr %>% 
  mutate(
    PUMA = str_pad(public_use_microdata_area,5,"left","0")
  ) %>% 
  filter(PUMA %in% bay_pumas$PUMACE10)
```

my variables
```{r}
bay_pums_elderly <-
  bay_pums %>% 
  filter(!duplicated(SERIALNO)) %>% 
  mutate(
    WGTP = as.numeric(WGTP),
    xint_60_older = ifelse(
      (R60 == 1|| 2 ) &
      #||
        #(R65 == 1 || 2) &
        (ACCESS == 3),
      WGTP,
      0
    )
  ) %>% 
  group_by(PUMA) %>% 
  summarize(
    perc_xint_60_older =
      sum(xint_60_older, na.rm =T)/sum(WGTP, na.rm = T)*100
  ) %>% 
  left_join(
    bay_pumas %>% 
      select(PUMACE10),
    by = c("PUMA" = "PUMACE10")
  ) %>% 
  st_as_sf()
```

```{r}
pums_pal <- colorNumeric(
  palette = "Reds",
  domain = bay_pums_elderly$perc_xint_60_older
)

leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>% 
  addPolygons(
    data = bay_pums_elderly,
    fillColor = ~pums_pal(perc_xint_60_older),
    color = "white",
    opacity = 0.5,
    fillOpacity = 0.5,
    weight = 1,
    label = ~paste0(
      round(perc_xint_60_older), 
      "% Households without internet with 1 or more residents 60 or older"
    ),
    highlightOptions = highlightOptions(
      weight = 2,
      opacity = 1
    )
  ) %>% 
  addLegend(
    data = bay_pums_elderly,
    pal = pums_pal,
    values = ~perc_xint_60_older,
    title = "% Households without internet <br> with 1 or more residents <br> 60 or older "
  )
```
